scripts.clean-install: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.js && npm install
scripts.emergency-install: rm -rf ~/.rncache && rm -fr $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && npm run clean-install
scripts.harden-and-sync-kin-module: rm -rf node_modules/react-native-kin1 && npm install && rsync -avL --exclude='example' --exclude='.idea' --exclude='.git' node_modules/react-native-kin/ node_modules/react-native-kin1 && rm -rf node_modules/react-native-kin && mv node_modules/react-native-kin1 node_modules/react-native-kin
scripts.pod-install: npm run harden-and-sync-kin-module && cd ios && pod install
